colleges.pattern: What colleges do(?:es|) G(?:eorgia State(?: U(?:niversity|)|)|SU) have\?

whois.respond: Hello, $M$, I am PantherBot. I am a bot created by $O$ and I am here to provide an ease of access for Georgia State University

channel.pattern: What is the name of this channel\?
channel.respond: The name of this channel is $C$!

server.pattern: What is the name of this server\?
server.respond: The name of this server is $G$!
